Html:
What should I changed so the emoticons button and the associated resources don't get emitted to the client?

It's not needed for the current implementation. The editor will be used to enter business related text. And I'm also trying to make the asp page "lighter."

Yes.

Open up the project solution.
Comment out the following line in rte.cs :

toolbar.AddButton(AjaxControls.ToolBar.ToolbarItemType.ImageButton, ToolTips"Emoticons".ToString(), 17, "OnEmoticon",null,"RteEmoticon");

Build -> Deploy -> Bang !
